newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.019pts to 102.396.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.019pts to 102.396.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.019 points in Wednesday's trading to 102.396, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.612 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.008 points to 99.076, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.472 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 0.566 points to 1,066.002.
